title: Serenity of the Spring Tea Ceremony
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, detailed illustration, 2D Anime style, a serene Japanese tea ceremony (Chanoyu) featuring two young women, full body view, seated kneeling (seiza) on tatami mats, facing each other across a polished bamboo table. One woman wears a traditional mint green kimono, the other wears a soft pink kimono. They are carefully preparing matcha green tea using traditional bowls and bamboo whisks. The table holds a black iron kettle (tetsubin), steaming utensils, and colorful wagashi sweets (dango). The setting is a traditional Japanese room (washitsu) with large sliding windows overlooking a lush spring garden, featuring a tranquil pond, river stones, and vibrant pink cherry blossoms (sakura) blooming. Soft daylight lighting, peaceful atmosphere, 16:9 aspect ratio.
